summary: Comprehensive frontend testing completed for Ã–H Wirtschaft website redesign v4. Modern, friendly design with blue/gold colors, animations, and mobile responsiveness all working perfectly.
passed_tests: Page loader with bouncing dots (2.2s) working perfectly
Navigation between all pages (Home, Team, Studium, Services, Magazine, 404)
Mobile responsiveness at 375px with hamburger menu
Gradient elements: top bar (blue-gold-blue) and CTA sections
Both accent colors used extensively (17 blue + 18 gold elements)
Pill-shaped buttons (30 found) and proper button styling
Team page: Vorsitzender card with blue gradient, 13 member cards with initials
Studium page: 4 program cards, 3 brochure links, interactive accordions
Services page: 3 service cards, 5 calendar links, FAQ accordions
Magazine page: editions card with gradient, contribute sections, timeline
Footer with dark slate design and gradient top bar
All data-testid attributes present and functional
Quick link cards clickable and navigate properly
Update and FAQ accordions expand/contract correctly
External links properly configured (calendar, brochures, forms)
